entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Freezing rain or rain beginning before morning. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Freezing rain with rain early in the morning and ice pellets in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
